HotKeyLink.AskRules: Variables String ask_StartCode [15,1] Alias 1 Hidden Input Init = "" ; String ask_EndCode [15,1] Alias 2 Hidden Input Init = "" ; End Dialogs Begin Dialog AskContacts "" Begin Controls Begin Begin ask_StartCode Prompt = (GetTitle("localized_StartCode")) LowerLimit HotLink ERP.Contacts.Dbl.ProspectiveSuppliers () ; ask_EndCode Prompt = (GetTitle("localized_EndCode")) UpperLimit HotLink ERP.Contacts.Dbl.ProspectiveSuppliers () ; End End End End

SelectionModes.Mode:
SELECT ProspectiveSupplier { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.ProspectiveSupplier } ,CompanyName { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.CompanyName } ,EMail { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.EMail } ,Address { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.Address } ,ZIPCode { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.ZIPCode } ,City { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.City } ,County { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.County } ,Country { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.Country } ,ContactPerson { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.ContactPerson } ,Notes { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.Notes } ,Disabled { COL MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.Disabled } ,1 as sort FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppliers WHERE ProspectiveSupplier BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND (EMail <> '' OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople WHERE MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.ProspectiveSupplier = MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.ProspectiveSupplier AND MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Email <> {''} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches WHERE MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.ProspectiveSupplier = MA_ProspectiveSuppliers.ProspectiveSupplier AND MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.Email <> {''} ) )
UNION SELECT ProspectiveSupplier {+} '-' {+} Branch AS ProspectiveSupplier ,CompanyName ,EMail ,Address ,ZIPCode ,City ,County ,Country ,ContactPerson ,Notes ,Disabled ,3 as sort FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches WHERE MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.ProspectiveSupplier BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND (EMail <> {''} OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople WHERE MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.ProspectiveSupplier = MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.ProspectiveSupplier AND MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Branch = MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.Branch AND MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Email <> {''} ) )
UNION SELECT MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.ProspectiveSupplier {+} '-' {+} MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Branch AS ProspectiveSupplier ,'>' {+} MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Name ,MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.EMail ,{''} AS Address ,{''} AS ZIPCode ,{''} AS City ,{''} AS County ,{''} AS Country ,WorkingPosition ,MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Notes ,{FALSE} AS Disabled , { WHEN GetDatabaseType ( ) != "ORACLE" EXPAND { CASE MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Branch WHEN '' THEN 2 ELSE 4 END } ELSE { Decode( MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Branch, '', 2, ' ', 2, 4) } } AS sort FROM MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches ON MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.ProspectiveSupplier = MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.ProspectiveSupplier AND MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.Branch = MA_ProspectiveSuppBranches.Branch WHERE MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.ProspectiveSupplier BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND MA_ProspectiveSuppPeople.EMail <> {''} ORDER BY 1, sort
